pause().Description: Request that the player pause its playback and stay at its current position.

skipToQueueItem(long).Description: Plays an item with a specific id in the play queue. If you specify an id that is not in the play queue, the behavior is undefined.

Parameters: String: The action identifier of the @B_android#support#v4#media#session#PlaybackStateCompat#CustomAction_E@ as specified by the @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaSessionCompat_E@.
Bundle: Optional arguments to supply to the @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaSessionCompat_E@ for this custom action.
sendCustomAction(java.lang.String,androi.Description: Sends the id and args from a custom action for the @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaSessionCompat_E@ to perform.
sendCustomAction(java.lang.String,androi.FullName: public abstract void sendCustomAction (String action, Bundle args)

Parameters: Uri: The URI of the requested media.
Bundle: Optional extras that can include extra information about the media item to be prepared.
prepareFromUri(android.net.Uri, android..Description: Request that the player prepare playback for a specific @B_android#net#Uri_E@. In other words, other session can continue to play during the preparation of this session. This method can be used to speed up the start of the playback. Once the preparation is done, the session will change its playback state to @B_android#support#v4#media#session#PlaybackStateCompat#STATE_PAUSED_E@. Afterwards, @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaControllerCompat#TransportControls#play_E@ can be called to start playback. If the preparation is not needed, @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaControllerCompat#TransportControls#playFromUri_E@ can be directly called without this method.

Parameters: Uri: The URI of the requested media.
Bundle: Optional extras that can include extra information about the media item to be played.
playFromUri(android.net.Uri, android.os..Description: Request that the player start playback for a specific @B_android#net#Uri_E@.

Parameters: String: The uri of the requested media.
Bundle: Optional extras that can include extra information about the media item to be played.
playFromMediaId(java.lang.String,android.Description: Request that the player start playback for a specific https:##developer#android#com@B_android#net#Uri_E@.
playFromMediaId(java.lang.String,android.FullName: public abstract void playFromMediaId (String mediaId, Bundle extras)

Parameters: Uri: The URI of the requested media.
Bundle: Optional extras that can include extra information about the media item to be prepared.
prepareFromUri(android.net.Uri,android.o.Description: Request that the player prepare playback for a specific https:##developer#android#com@B_android#net#Uri_E@. This can decrease the time it takes to start playback when a play command is received. Preparation is not required. Parameters: Bundle: Optional arguments to supply to the @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaSessionCompat_E@ for this custom action.
sendCustomAction(android.support.v4.medi.Description: Sends a custom action for the @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaSessionCompat_E@ to perform.
sendCustomAction(android.support.v4.medi.FullName: public abstract void sendCustomAction (PlaybackStateCompat.CustomAction customAction, Bundle args)

prepare().Description: Request that the player prepare for playback. This can decrease the time it takes to start playback when a play command is received. Preparation is not required. You can call @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaControllerCompat#TransportControls#play_E@ without calling this method beforehand.

Parameters: int: The shuffle mode. Must be one of the followings: @B_android#support#v4#media#session#PlaybackStateCompat#SHUFFLE_MODE_NONE_E@, @B_android#support#v4#media#session#PlaybackStateCompat#SHUFFLE_MODE_ALL_E@, @B_android#support#v4#media#session#PlaybackStateCompat#SHUFFLE_MODE_GROUP_E@
setShuffleMode(int).Description: Sets the shuffle mode for this session.

fastForward().Description: Starts fast forwarding. If playback is already fast forwarding this may increase the rate.

Parameters: int: The repeat mode. Must be one of the followings: @B_android#support#v4#media#session#PlaybackStateCompat#REPEAT_MODE_NONE_E@, @B_android#support#v4#media#session#PlaybackStateCompat#REPEAT_MODE_ONE_E@, @B_android#support#v4#media#session#PlaybackStateCompat#REPEAT_MODE_ALL_E@, @B_android#support#v4#media#session#PlaybackStateCompat#REPEAT_MODE_GROUP_E@
setRepeatMode(int).Description: Sets the repeat mode for this session.

This can decrease the time it takes to start playback when a play command is received. Preparation is not required. You can call @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaControllerCompat#TransportControls#playFromMediaId_E@ without calling this method beforehand.

Parameters: long: Position to move to, in milliseconds.
seekTo(long).Description: Moves to a new location in the media stream.

Parameters: boolean: true to enable the shuffle mode, false to disable.
setShuffleModeEnabled(boolean).Description: Use @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaControllerCompat#TransportControls#setShuffleMode_E@ instead. Set the shuffle mode for this session.

Parameters: RatingCompat: The rating to set for the current content
setRating(android.support.v4.media.Ratin.Description: Rates the current content. This will cause the rating to be set for the current user. The rating type of the given @B_android#support#v4#media#RatingCompat_E@ must match the type returned by @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaControllerCompat#getRatingType_E@.

rewind().Description: Starts rewinding. If playback is already rewinding this may increase the rate.

play().Description: Request that the player start its playback at its current position.

Parameters: boolean: true to enable captioning, false to disable.
Bundle: Optional extras that can include extra information about the query.
playFromSearch(java.lang.String,android..Description: Request that the player start playback for a specific search query. An empty or null query should be treated as a request to play any music.
playFromSearch(java.lang.String,android..FullName: public abstract void playFromSearch (String query, Bundle extras)

stop().Description: Request that the player stop its playback; it may clear its state in whatever way is appropriate.

Parameters: RatingCompat: The rating to set for the media item.
Bundle: Optional arguments that can include information about the media item to be rated.
setRating(android.support.v4.media.Ratin.Description: Rates a media item. This will cause the rating to be set for the specific media item. The rating type of the given @B_android#support#v4#media#RatingCompat_E@ must match the type returned by @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaControllerCompat#getRatingType_E@.
setRating(android.support.v4.media.Ratin.FullName: public abstract void setRating (RatingCompat rating, Bundle extras)

ClassDesc: Interface for controlling media playback on a session. This allows an app to send media transport commands to the session.
